parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To know, remember, appreciate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Plural
str2: Inward thought, reflection, plur: thoughts. From enthumeomai; deliberation.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Adjective - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: From meros; to part, i.e. to apportion, bestow, share, or to disunite, differ.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make desolate, bring to desolation, destroy, waste, (b) of a person: I strip, rob. From eremos; to lay waste.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Adjective - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: From oikos; properly, residence, but usually an abode; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: From meros; to part, i.e. to apportion, bestow, share, or to disunite, differ.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
